{{Wired embedded system |brand=IoT Defense |model=RATtrap |revision=v1.0 |upc=748252233196 |asin=B06W2N476V |is_manuf=No |price=230 |est_release_date=12/2016 |type=firewall |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=AM3352 |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Kingston |fla1_model=EMMC04G-M627 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Kingston |ram1_model=D2516EC4BXGGB |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V,, (115200 8N1),, J11 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211F |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8211F |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 }} {{TagLine|Smart Internet Security Firewall}} :[https://www.myrattrap.com/ Product page]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[TI]]'' AM3352 (BZCZ100) :SoC: @1.0GHz ARM (Cortex-A8) :NEON floating-point accelerator :2x PRU 32-bit microcontrollers *Storage: 4GB (eMMC 5.1) *Memory: 512MB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *Power Source: 5V 2A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:IoT Defense RATtrap Top.jpeg|Board Top File:IoT Defense RATtrap Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
